VPR.A: The heatmap shows a {radial gradient} pattern.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to TikTok and Data Privacy or the cell corresponding to Blogs and Monetization?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Blogs} and {Monetization} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Gaming Platforms and Algorithms or the cell corresponding to TikTok and Content?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Gaming Platforms} and {Algorithms} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Online News and Advertising or the cell corresponding to Blogs and Data Privacy?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Blogs} and {Data Privacy} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.49 to 0.58?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Spotify, Advertising), (Spotify, Algorithms), (Spotify, Content), (Spotify, Creator Economy), (TikTok, Creator Economy), (Spotify, Engagement), (TikTok, Engagement), (TikTok, Monetization), (Twitter, Monetization)}.
